page.title: 13ADULT LEISURE TIME
page.content:
Some comments made were:- "I like to go to the pub so I can have a bit of peace."
{"I like to go to a restaurant for a {meal because after cooking and {cleaning up after my husband and 3 {children it's lovely to sit down, eat {a meal and not to wash any dishes."
"My dad runs a pool and snooker team at the Pack Horse. The meetings are on Sundays and the matches are on Wednesdays. Once a year they have pool knockouts and you can win a hundred pounds for charity and a trophy."
{"My mum watches T.V. mainly because of {Dallas, Dynasty and Falcon's Crest. {While she watches T.V. she knits with {all types of wool."
